title: Level 30
body:
So I recently hit lvl 30. I had a 10 win boost and I have 7 wins left on the boost. What happens now since I cant earn anymore XP towards my levels? (BTW: That was the only boost I ever got, I don't want anyone to think I boosted my XP to lvl 30...)
{{champion:238}}

replies.body: It does absolutely nothing. Why on earth did you buy an xp boost at lv29?
I don't know... I thought it would last longer than 3 wins. I didn't realize how much xp you get from a win. Lol
